column1: Baby Barnaby's////As for the one negative aspect of this restaurant
column2: it is the wait... oh damn
column3: the wait.  Time it right or the wait will be unbearable.  It is a small establishment
column4: and the crowd is horrendous on the weekends.  They place a clipboard up that you write your name on when it is busy
column5: which is good because you can figure out how many people are ahead of you.  This place also is not suitable for large parties.  Please open another location
column6: Baby!!!  I'm sure your fans would love it!
